entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:25 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -27.6°C
entry.summary:

Condition: Mostly Cloudy

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 50 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 30. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 43 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:17 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
